name: SergeantTabata
0:
”Alexa, start Sergeant Tabata.”
”Alexa, ask Sergeant Tabata to start a standard tabata.”
”Alexa, ask Sergeant Tabata to start a ten minute tabata.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sergeant tabata
des:
Tabata training is a form of high intensity interval training suggested by Dr. Izumi Tabata. A standard "tabata" consists of eight rounds, each with twenty seconds of "work" and ten seconds of "rest". During the "work" portion of each round, you perform an exercise of your choice, like push-ups or sit-ups, at high intensity. During the "rest" portion of each round, you rest. Your goal is to perform the greatest number of repetitions in each round that you can safely maintain for all eight rounds. Tabata training has been demonstrated to be more effective at improving fitness than long duration, moderate intensity exercise.

Sergeant Tabata tells you when to work and when to rest. It supports standard tabatas and also custom tabatas with your choice of work time, rest time, and number of rounds.
